titleStmt.title: Description of A kabbalistic book of devotion for the Shabat.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Add MS 11433: A kabbalistic book of devotion for the Shabat. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A kabbalistic book of devotion for the Shabat.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew square script ('Amsterdam font') of the 18th century. Meshulam Zimel ben Mosheh of Polna: inscirbed, folio 1r.

decoDesc.decoNote: 2v Initial-word panels with penwork decoration in black ink.
8v Initial-word panels with penwork decoration in black ink.
10r Initial-word panels with penwork decoration in black ink.
22v Initial-word panels with penwork decoration in black ink.
32r Initial-word panels with penwork decoration in black ink.

1r
Title page framed by arch, with penwork decoration in black ink.

binding.p: Post-1600. Black leather, gold-tooled. Boxed. Spine: 'Liber Institut Sabbati. Hebraice. Mus. Brit. Jure Emptionis 11,433 Plut.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Purchased at Evans's on 27 July 1838, lot 1241: inscribed, folio [49v].
